name: react-scaffording
description: 1. react   - dependencies: react, react-dom 2. redux    - dependencies: redux, react-redux   - dev-dependencies: redux-devtools 3. react-router   - dependencies: react-router 4. webpack   - dev-dependencies: webpack, webpack-dev-server 5. babel   - dev-dependencies: babel-core, babel-loader, babel-preset-es2015, babel-preset-react 6. jquery 2.2.1^   - dependencies: jquery@2.2.1 7. loader    - css-loader, sass-loader, style-loader
